00148 int nfs_Rename( nfs_arg_t               * parg    /* IN  */,
00149                 exportlist_t            * pexport /* IN  */,
00150                 fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext   /* IN  */,
00151                 cache_inode_client_t    * pclient /* IN  */,
00152                 hash_table_t            * ht      /* INOUT */,
00153                 struct svc_req          * preq    /* IN  */,
00154                  nfs_res_t              * pres    /* OUT */ ) 
00155 {
00156         static char   __attribute__(( __unused__ ))     funcName[] = "nfs_Rename";
00157 
00158   char                    * str_entry_name = NULL    ;
00159   fsal_name_t               entry_name               ;
00160   char                    * str_new_entry_name = NULL;
00161   fsal_name_t               new_entry_name           ;
00162   cache_entry_t           * pentry            = NULL ;
00163   cache_entry_t           * new_pentry        = NULL ;
00164   cache_entry_t           * parent_pentry     = NULL ;
00165   cache_entry_t           * new_parent_pentry = NULL ;
00166   cache_entry_t           * should_not_exists = NULL ;
00167   cache_entry_t           * should_exists     = NULL ;
00168   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status             ;
00169   int                       rc                       ;
00170   fsal_attrib_list_t      * ppre_attr                ;
00171   fsal_attrib_list_t        pre_attr                 ;
00172   fsal_attrib_list_t      * pnew_pre_attr            ;
00173   fsal_attrib_list_t        new_attr                 ;
00174   fsal_attrib_list_t        new_parent_attr          ;
00175   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr                     ;
00176   fsal_attrib_list_t        tst_attr                 ;
00177   cache_inode_file_type_t   parent_filetype          ;
00178   cache_inode_file_type_t   new_parent_filetype      ;     
00179 
00180         if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3 )
00181         {
00182                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00183                 pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.fromdir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00184                 pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.fromdir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00185                 pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.todir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00186                 pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.todir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00187                 ppre_attr = NULL;
00188                 pnew_pre_attr = NULL;
00189         }
00190   
00191         /* Convert fromdir file handle into a cache_entry */
00192   if( ( parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers,
00193                                             &(parg->arg_rename2.from.dir),
00194                                             &(parg->arg_rename3.from.dir),
00195                                             NULL, 
00196                                             &(pres->res_dirop2.status),
00197                                             &(pres->res_create3.status),
00198                                             NULL, 
00199                                             &pre_attr,
00200                                             pcontext, 
00201                                             pclient,
00202                                             ht, 
00203                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00204     {
00205       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00206       return rc ;
00207     }      
00208 
00209   
00210         /* Convert todir file handle into a cache_entry */
00211   if( ( new_parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers,
00212                                                 &(parg->arg_rename2.to.dir),
00213                                                 &(parg->arg_rename3.to.dir),
00214                                                 NULL,
00215                                                 &(pres->res_dirop2.status),
00216                                                 &(pres->res_create3.status),
00217                                                 NULL, 
00218                                                 &new_parent_attr, 
00219                                                 pcontext, 
00220                                                 pclient, 
00221                                                 ht, 
00222                                                 &rc ) ) == NULL )
00223     {
00224       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00225       return rc ;
00226     }     
00227 
00228   /* get the attr pointers */
00229   ppre_attr = &pre_attr ;
00230   pnew_pre_attr = &new_parent_attr ;
00231   
00232   /* Get the filetypes */
00233   parent_filetype     = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( pre_attr.type )     ;
00234   new_parent_filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( new_parent_attr.type ) ;
00235   
00236         /*
00237          * Sanity checks: we must manage directories
00238          */
00239   if( ( parent_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING &&  parent_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE  ) ||
00240       ( new_parent_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING &&  new_parent_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE  ) )
00241         {
00242                 switch (preq->rq_vers)
00243                 {
00244                 case NFS_V2:
00245       pres->res_stat2 = NFSERR_NOTDIR;
00246       break;
00247       
00248     case NFS_V3:
00249       pres->res_rename3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00250       break;
00251                 }
00252     
00253                 return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00254         }
00255   
00256   switch (preq->rq_vers)
00257     {
00258     case NFS_V2:
00259                         str_entry_name = parg->arg_rename2.from.name;
00260                         str_new_entry_name = parg->arg_rename2.to.name;
00261                         break;
00262 
00263     case NFS_V3:
00264                         str_entry_name = parg->arg_rename3.from.name;
00265                         str_new_entry_name = parg->arg_rename3.to.name;
00266                         break;
00267     }
00268 
00269         pentry = new_pentry = NULL;
00270 
00271         if( str_entry_name == NULL                                                                     || 
00272       strlen( str_entry_name ) == 0                                                              ||
00273             str_new_entry_name == NULL                                                                 || 
00274       strlen( str_new_entry_name ) == 0                                                          ||
00275       FSAL_IS_ERROR( FSAL_str2name( str_entry_name, FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN, &entry_name ) )           ||
00276       FSAL_IS_ERROR( FSAL_str2name( str_new_entry_name, FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN, &new_entry_name ) ) )
00277     {
00278       cache_status = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00279     } 
00280   else
00281     {
00282       /*
00283        * Lookup file to see if new entry exists
00284        *
00285        */
00286       should_not_exists =  cache_inode_lookup( new_parent_pentry, 
00287                                                &new_entry_name, 
00288                                                &tst_attr,
00289                                                ht,
00290                                                pclient,
00291                                                pcontext, 
00292                                                &cache_status );
00293       
00294       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND )
00295         {
00296           /* We need to lookup over the old entry also */
00297           should_exists = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry,
00298                                               &entry_name, 
00299                                               &tst_attr,
00300                                               ht, 
00301                                               pclient,
00302                                               pcontext, 
00303                                               &cache_status );
00304           
00305           /* Rename entry */
00306           if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00307             cache_inode_rename( parent_pentry, 
00308                                 &entry_name, 
00309                                 new_parent_pentry,
00310                                 &new_entry_name, 
00311                                 &attr, 
00312                                 &new_attr, 
00313                                 ht, 
00314                                 pclient, 
00315                                 pcontext, 
00316                                 &cache_status ) ;
00317           
00318           
00319           if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00320             {
00321               switch( preq->rq_vers )
00322                 {
00323                 case NFS_V2:
00324                   pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00325                   break;
00326 
00327                 case NFS_V3:
00328                   /*
00329                    * Build Weak Cache Coherency
00330                    * data 
00331                    */
00332                   nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00333                                   parent_pentry, 
00334                                   ppre_attr, 
00335                                   &attr, 
00336                                   &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.fromdir_wcc) );
00337                   
00338                   nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00339                                   new_parent_pentry, 
00340                                   pnew_pre_attr,
00341                                   &new_attr,
00342                                   &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.todir_wcc));
00343                   
00344                   pres->res_rename3.status = NFS3_OK;
00345                   break;
00346                   
00347                 }
00348               
00349               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00350             }
00351         }
00352       else
00353         {
00354           /* If name are the same (basically renaming a/file1 to a/file1, this is a non-erroneous situation to be managed */
00355           if( new_parent_pentry == parent_pentry )
00356             {
00357               if( !FSAL_namecmp( &new_entry_name, &entry_name ) )
00358                 {
00359                   /* trying to rename a file to himself, this is allowed */
00360                   cache_status = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00361                   switch( preq->rq_vers )
00362                     {
00363                     case NFS_V2:
00364                       pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00365                       break;
00366                       
00367                     case NFS_V3:
00368                       /*
00369                        * Build Weak Cache Coherency
00370                        * data 
00371                        */
00372                       nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00373                                       parent_pentry, 
00374                                       ppre_attr, 
00375                                       &attr, 
00376                                       &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.fromdir_wcc) );
00377                       
00378                       nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00379                                       parent_pentry, 
00380                                       ppre_attr,
00381                                       &attr,
00382                                       &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.todir_wcc));
00383                       
00384                       pres->res_rename3.status = NFS3_OK;
00385                       break;
00386                       
00387                     }
00388                   
00389                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00390                 }
00391               
00392             }
00393 
00394           /* New entry already exists. In this case (see RFC), entry should be compatible: Both are non-directories or 
00395            * both are directories and 'todir' is empty. If compatible, old 'todir' entry is scratched, if not returns EEXISTS */
00396           if( should_not_exists != NULL )
00397             {
00398               /* We need to lookup over the old entry also */
00399               if( ( should_exists = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry,
00400                                                         &entry_name, 
00401                                                         &tst_attr,
00402                                                         ht, 
00403                                                         pclient,
00404                                                         pcontext, 
00405                                                         &cache_status ) ) != NULL )
00406                 {
00407                   if( cache_inode_type_are_rename_compatible( should_exists, should_not_exists ) )
00408                     {
00409                       /* Remove the old entry before renaming it */
00410                       if( cache_inode_remove( new_parent_pentry, 
00411                                               &new_entry_name, 
00412                                               &tst_attr, 
00413                                               ht, 
00414                                               pclient, 
00415                                               pcontext,
00416                                               &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00417                         {
00418                           if( cache_inode_rename( parent_pentry, 
00419                                                   &entry_name, 
00420                                                   new_parent_pentry,
00421                                                   &new_entry_name, 
00422                                                   &attr, 
00423                                                   &new_attr, 
00424                                                   ht, 
00425                                                   pclient, 
00426                                                   pcontext, 
00427                                                   &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00428                             {
00429                               /* trying to rename a file to himself, this is allowed */
00430                               switch( preq->rq_vers )
00431                                 {
00432                                 case NFS_V2:
00433                                   pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00434                                   break;
00435                                   
00436                                 case NFS_V3:
00437                                   /*
00438                                    * Build Weak Cache Coherency
00439                                    * data 
00440                                    */
00441                                   nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00442                                                   parent_pentry, 
00443                                                   ppre_attr, 
00444                                                   &attr, 
00445                                                   &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.fromdir_wcc) );
00446                                   
00447                                   nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00448                                                   parent_pentry, 
00449                                                   ppre_attr,
00450                                                   &attr,
00451                                                   &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.todir_wcc));
00452                                   
00453                                   pres->res_rename3.status = NFS3_OK;
00454                                   break;
00455                                   
00456                                 }
00457                               
00458                               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00459                             }
00460                         }
00461                       
00462                     }
00463                 } /*  if( cache_inode_type_are_rename_compatible( should_exists, should_not_exists ) ) */
00464             } /* if( ( should_exists = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry, .... */
00465 
00466           /* If this point is reached, then destination object already exists with that name in the directory 
00467              and types are not compatible, we should return that the file exists */
00468           cache_status =  CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS ;
00469         } /* if( should_not_exists != NULL ) */
00470     }
00471   
00472         /* If we are here, there was an error */
00473         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00474         {
00475                 return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00476         }
00477   
00478         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00479                        preq->rq_vers, 
00480                        cache_status,
00481                        &pres->res_stat2,
00482                        &pres->res_rename3.status,
00483                        NULL, NULL,
00484                        parent_pentry, 
00485                        ppre_attr,
00486                        &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.fromdir_wcc),
00487                        new_parent_pentry,
00488                        pnew_pre_attr,
00489                        &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.todir_wcc));
00490   
00491         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00492   
00493 } /* nfs_Rename */

00504 void nfs_Rename_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00505 {
00506   /* Nothing to do here */
00507   return ;
00508 } /* nfs_Rename_Free */
